commit message:
Modified keypad layouts to give equal button widths when No. rather than
# is shown when region is set to UK.

Merge pull request #5 from andrew-codechimp/master

Numeric Keypad with UK regionalisation not equally spaced

fixed restore_found in values-ru/strings.xml

Replacement pattern '%1$s' was missing the trailing 's'
import translations from Launchpad
import translations from Launchpad
Switched from deprecated dialog handling to newer ProgressDialog() in PassList
Change PassList to use AsyncTask to build the rows.
Update ServiceNotification to use NotificationCompat.Builder.

Small changes to make lint happy.

Decided not to battle the Trivium framework Engine and just suppress the warning.

For ICS and higher, no longer show screenshot on recent apps for PassView and PassEdit
Fixed bug where master password would be required twice in order to open safe

Centralize salt and masterKey to new class Master.

Different classes had their own copy of salt and masterKey.  Removed them all by using a dedicated class to statically contain the two variables.
Added an ignore to skip Eclipse .settings folder

Clean up on ChangePass and ServiceDispatchImpl

Removed unused thread functions from ChangePass.  Added a few function comments and removed duplicate code in ServiceDispatchImpl.

Moved auto locking to new AutoLockService class

Totally gutted ServiceDispatchImpl and moved all auto lock aspects to new class AutoLockService, which is now started upon successful unlocking in AskPassword.  Hopefully this will be the nail in the coffin of not having a service running after an unlock.  Plus this makes the auto lock process more straight forward.

Still need to clean up IntentHandler to no longer have a service at all.

Added progress bar to notification

Updated Android support library v4.  For API 14 and up, added progress bar to the notification.  Progress bar starts at full and reduces down as the auto lock timer ticks down.

Forgot the PendingIntent for the Notification.

Also added the readme.txt comment on progress bar for Notification.

Stop AutoLock service on LogOffActivity.

Also only update progress on notification if we have a Master Key.
Added a wrapper to better handle Notification.Builder
Moved global ch to CryptoContentProvider

Vanquished ServiceDispatch from being used.
IntentHandler no longer uses a service.
Corrected some issues with IntentHandler
Password validation issue for less than 3 characters password at the Initial Login fixed.

Merge pull request #7 from harshadura/OI-537

Password validation issue for less than 3 characters password at Initial login fixed
rename ver 1.4.2 to 1.4.2-alpha
